Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

XMIDI Clear Beat-Bar Count (118)

Discussion

Value unused, 0-127.

This controller resets the current beat and measure counters to 0:0. See the AIL_sequence_position function description for information on the beat and measure counters.

Next Topic (XMIDI Callback Trigger (119))

Previous Topic (XMIDI Next-Break Loop Controller (117))


Group: Extended MIDI Technical Reference
Related Functions: AIL_sequence_position
